1648460.name: Space One - Electron
1648460.description:
Currently, not all features listed below are available. We are a small studio and are developing Space One - Electron as fast as we can.


We start in deep space, in a small ship called the 'Electron'.
• Explore the universe, its stars, worlds and moons.
• Mine asteroids, gas clouds, ice fields, and comets to gather resources.
• Construct space stations and space colonies and grow your galactic empire!
• Craft ship parts, character armor, buildings and so much more!
• Manage colony resources through manual labour or through commanding drones, robots and workers to harvest for you!
• Buy, sell and trade resources at various colonies you create in an attempt to establish a home for humanity amongst the stars.
• Construct space farms, to feed your people, fuel your research and expand your empire!
• Research hundreds of techs used to advance yourself and your colonies!
• Improve your ship, buy new ships and improve your skills to aid you in every part of the game!
• Explore planets, and construct planetary colonies in a glorious attempt to gain galactic supremacy!

The June 2022 Update will contain a lot of new features and improvements.
Here is a quick look at ship interiors:


Planned Support Features by 4th Quarter, 2022:
  • Partial Controller Support
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Leaderboards
  • Steam Stats
  • Steam Cloud
  • Ubuntu Support
  • Mac Support
1648460.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
